fullText: This is a story that speaks to now, and I really wish I could hear it clearly over the hideous shouting of auteur Rebecca Frecknall’s grotesque production at the August Wilson Theatre, where it arrives on a wave of acclaim from across the pond (the West End run is ongoing).
